column4: hello everyone I have a problem I installed already the w32codecs and some others that I don't remember and still I can not play *.wmv files
try using vlc player
it supports everything under the sun

it supports streaming as well as a firefox plugin
I am going to try it
how can i select the aplication i want to use with firefox?

vlc is not working either
what error message is it giving you?
sidlet:VLC media player 0.8.6c Janus
X Error of failed request:  BadAlloc (insufficient resources for operation)

that the error
